attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many times in the papers now, we hear of "political correctness" gone wrong, and how human rights impedes things such as prisoners - in fact, one article mentioned an institute for young offenders using their funding to buy luxuries like televisions and new games consoles...
I was always taught as a child, that with rights, come responsibilities. If people act irresponsibly, they should lose rights. It is my FIRM belief that being tough on criminals in this manner would cut crime. If a repeat offender for instance, lost the right to early release for good behaviour, or other things of this nature, they would be less likely to re-offend.
Place rights hand-in-hand with responsibility, where they should have been all along.
Jail should be jail. Criminals should be criminals. Justice should be justice. 
Give us justice.
Give us rights.
Give us responsibility.
